about_the_game:
Ragnar is a god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler that brings Norse mythology to life by combining fast-paced combat, rich atmospheric exploration, and a character-driven narrative. Stand against Loki’s chaos, grow stronger with every battle, and uncover the secrets hidden across the Nine Realms.

A NEW BEGINNING AT THE END OF THE UNIVERSE

Ragnarok has unfolded, shattering the world and the gods. Loki has slain Odin, and chaos engulfs the realms. With Thor’s support, you will rise as Asgard’s last hope, challenging Loki and exploring worlds teetering on the brink. From the roots of Yggdrasil, regain your divine power and experience the most epic tales of Norse mythology firsthand.

BUILD YOUR OWN STRENGTH

Ragnar offers a procedurally generated world filled with challenges in every room, where you will earn weapons, abilities, and divine blessings. Combine powers like Tyr’s Spear of Justice and Freya’s Phantom Ambush to craft your own unique combat style. As you advance toward Loki, encounter Loki’s Curses, which will make your path even more treacherous and demand adaptive strategies. Each journey to Asgard allows for a unique combination of powers. Shape your style, experiment with different strategies, and grow stronger with every encounter against Loki!

MEET GODS, GIANTS, AND SPIRITS

Forge deep bonds with familiar figures like Thor, Freya, Heimdall, and Eitri, while confronting dark and legendary foes. Your interactions with these characters will shape your story, immersing you in a saga filled with the aid of allies and the fury of enemies.

A NEW WORLD WITH EVERY ATTEMPT

The branches of Yggdrasil lead you into the depths of the Nine Realms. Each journey offers new challenges, mysterious lands, and unique enemies. Explore the majestic halls of Asgard, the enchanted forests of Vanaheim, the dark depths of Helheim, and the fiery chaos of Muspelheim. Confront giants in the vast lands of Jotunheim, survive the icy labyrinths of Niflheim, uncover mysteries under the shimmering lights of Alfheim, and follow the traces of dwarves in the iron-filled dungeons of Svartalfheim. Starting from the heart of Yggdrasil, gather legendary artifacts and enchanted weapons, unravel ancient secrets, and come one step closer to overthrowing Loki’s throne.

DISCOVER THE SECRETS OF IMMORTALITY

Your path is your choice. Will you take the easier route, or chase rewards by embracing greater challenges to face Loki? With permanent upgrades and a dynamic progression system, you will grow stronger with every run.

DEVELOPMENT DRIVEN BY EARLY ACCESS

Ragnar will evolve based on player feedback. Each update will introduce new characters, weapons, mechanics, and story elements, deepening and enriching the game’s world as it grows.

THE PATH TO VICTORY

Gather the remnants of Thor’s shattered hammer, stand against the chaos of Ragnarok, and dethrone Loki as you become a beacon of hope in the darkest days of Norse mythology.

Are you ready to rewrite your destiny?

  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 5600 XT, or Intel Arc A580
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: In this epic Norse myth-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler, wield divine power to challenge Loki and uncover the secrets of the Nine Realms through the branches of Yggdrasil. Grow stronger and reshape Ragnarok’s fate with legendary weapons of the gods.
